name: Linked - A Love Story
description:
A reminiscence of a journey with the Hero of Time, and all the feelings contained therein.

Written during a workday for Wednesdev Game Jam #1.

Modifiers:-

Chocolate Chillies - This is my version of a "remake" of a classic game, I guess.

Pinterest Artist - Can't have any original art if there's no art. Checkmate.

Undelete Button - OK so I did cheat a bit here and fixed some typos, but 99% of all content is unedited bar spelling fixes.
